Magnetic Head: Embed a magnet into the brush head to allow the artist to easily store and organize their paintbrushes on a magnetic surface, keeping them dry and clean.
Adjustable Brush Head: Design a detachable brush head that can be easily adjusted to different sizes and shapes, providing the artist with versatility and precision in their work.
Paintbrush Cleaner: Integrate a small, built-in brush cleaner into the handle, allowing the artist to clean their brushes quickly and efficiently without having to wash them in water.
Paintbrush Grip: Add a textured grip to the handle for improved comfort and control during long painting sessions.
Brush Head Cover: Create a removable cover for the brush head to protect the bristles from dust, paint, and other debris, extending the life of the brush.
